aspguidc.service.generation.writer.general

Class GeneralTemplateWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidc.service.generation.writer.general.GeneralTemplateWriter

  • public class GeneralTemplateWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writer class which provides methods for generating general source code files. An instance of this class is assigned to a single target directory, which is used to store the generated source code files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneralTemplateWriter(java.io.File sourceCodeDirectory)
      Create a new writer instance with the given directory as output directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void writeBuildFile(java.lang.String projectName, java.lang.String jarFileName)
      Generate and write the ant build file to the directory which is assigned to the writer instance.
      void writeLogicProgram(java.io.File logicProgramFile)
      Write the content of the given logic program file to an new file inside the directory which is assigned to the writer instance.
      void writeMainFile(java.lang.String programName, java.lang.String author)
      Generate and write the program main file to the directory which is assigned to the writer instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public GeneralTemplateWriter(java.io.File sourceCodeDirectory)
        Create a new writer instance with the given directory as output directory.

    • Method Detail

      • writeBuildFile

        public void writeBuildFile(java.lang.String projectName,
                           java.lang.String jarFileName)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Generate and write the ant build file to the directory which is assigned to the writer instance.
        Parameters:
        projectName - string which is used as project name in the build file
        jarFileName - file of the jar which is generated by the "jar" target of the build file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeMainFile

        public void writeMainFile(java.lang.String programName,
                          java.lang.String author)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Generate and write the program main file to the directory which is assigned to the writer instance.
        Parameters:
        programName - program name which is used in the title of the window of the generated program
        author - author which is used in the title of the window of the generated program
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeLogicProgram

        public void writeLogicProgram(java.io.File logicProgramFile)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Write the content of the given logic program file to an new file inside the directory which is assigned to the writer instance.

        This method filters the gui definition comment from the content of the logic program file, to avoid parsing errors. This is needed, as the current version of dlv does not support multiline comments.

        Parameters:
        logicProgramFile - file of the logic program of which the content is written to the source code directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
